name: kubectl-helm
description: Kubectl plugin to run helm commands including custom commands like get templates RELEASENAME [--revision N]

scripts.pkg-win: npx pkg -t node16-win-x64 --out-path dist/win/bin .  && cp LICENSE dist/win/bin
scripts.pkg-linux: npx pkg -t node16-linux-x64 --out-path dist/linux/bin . && cp LICENSE dist/linux/bin
scripts.pkg-macos: npx pkg -t node16-macos-x64 --out-path dist/macos/bin . && cp LICENSE dist/macos/bin
scripts.pkg: npx tsc && npm run pkg-win  && npm run pkg-linux && npm run pkg-macos

author: Sandip Chitale <sandipchitale@gmail.com>
